item.description:
This week we will be gathering to listen to teachings and discuss aspects of mindfulness. In addition to our discussion and group meditation, we will be listening on Monday evening to Joseph Goldstein, co-founder of the Insight Meditation Society in Barre, MA. His talk will include discussion of the values of a lovingkindness practice as well as methods to incorporate it into our daily lives. Join us in mindful community as we seek to increase our awareness and clarity through mindfulness practice. All levels of practitioners are welcome.

TomC, Organizer
Portland Mindfulness Meetup
item.name: Weekly Meetup: Lovingkindness
